</h4><a id="user-content---" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：" href="#--"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><strong><a href="https://uptrain.ai" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">UpTrain</font></font></a></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">是一个用于评估和改进生成式 AI 应用程序的开源统一平台。</font></font><a href="https://github.com/uptrain-ai/uptrain?tab=readme-ov-file#pre-built-evaluations-we-offer-"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我们提供20 多个预配置评估</font></font></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">的评分</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">（涵盖语言、代码、嵌入用例），对失败案例进行</font></font><a href="https://github.com/uptrain-ai/uptrain/blob/main/examples/root_cause_analysis/rag_with_citation.ipynb"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">根本原因分析</font></font></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">，并提供有关如何解决这些问题的见解。</font></font></p>
<br>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">主要特点🔑</font></font></h1><a id="user-content-key-features-" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：主要功能🔑" href="#key-features-"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/36454110/311696329-eb1c8239-dd99-4e66-ba8a-cbaee2beec10.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..3g9yyO8YyvX4EV7VlVV3PL2ZRc8fBALLvZ2qtvvKgyE"><img width="1088" alt="交互式仪表板" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/36454110/311696329-eb1c8239-dd99-4e66-ba8a-cbaee2beec10.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..3g9yyO8YyvX4EV7VlVV3PL2ZRc8fBALLvZ2qtvvKgyE" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">UpTrain Dashboard 是一个基于 Web 的界面，在您的</font></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">本地计算机</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">上运行。您可以使用仪表板评估您的 LLM 申请、查看结果并执行根本原因分析。</font></font></p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/313376231-2700fe70-1ff6-4fa8-b85d-320e6245852f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..h2SgBJuca5QiFcx8JlPsFQ1oCt74YFdpAf6JT06hxgc"><img width="1088" alt="20 多个预配置评估" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/313376231-2700fe70-1ff6-4fa8-b85d-320e6245852f.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..h2SgBJuca5QiFcx8JlPsFQ1oCt74YFdpAf6JT06hxgc" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">支持</font></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">20 多种预先配置的评估，</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">例如响应完整性、事实准确性、上下文简洁性等。</font></font></p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879439-7b737bfc-b061-4f87-b51e-5bad67879332.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..NU2fi_6kL7Dce_zuHetUWAKP2hVNW2rO0IKIVwqYK1k"><img width="1088" alt="数据安全" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879439-7b737bfc-b061-4f87-b51e-5bad67879332.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..NU2fi_6kL7Dce_zuHetUWAKP2hVNW2rO0IKIVwqYK1k" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">所有评估和分析都在您的系统本地运行，确保数据永远不会离开您的安全环境（使用模型分级检查时的 LLM 调用除外）</font></font></p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879631-fd9c5c7f-3951-4d69-9b77-4fece6ff0830.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..tNqM0o1NZAw_n3IqHNuElereCne4Khqm5nhNYrygPb4"><img width="1088" alt="实验" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879631-fd9c5c7f-3951-4d69-9b77-4fece6ff0830.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..tNqM0o1NZAw_n3IqHNuElereCne4Khqm5nhNYrygPb4" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">尝试不同的嵌入模型，</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">例如 text-embedding-3-large/small、text-embedding-3-ada、baai/bge-large 等。UpTrain 支持 HuggingFace 模型、复制端点或端点上托管的自定义模型。</font></font></p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879803-32df049c-c0a4-4377-a807-f74e2efa57b5.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..VwnWK5HgZYxIEWtFIyvBsNeqO8hxFaG6bTF_UwYNzdM"><img width="1088" alt="根本原因分析" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879803-32df049c-c0a4-4377-a807-f74e2efa57b5.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..VwnWK5HgZYxIEWtFIyvBsNeqO8hxFaG6bTF_UwYNzdM" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">您可以对用户负面反馈或评估分数较低的案例</font></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">进行根本原因分析</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">，以了解 LLM 管道的哪一部分给出的结果不理想。查看支持的 RCA 模板。</font></font></p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/313145427-4c778006-5f93-4901-8ab8-620d908a7003.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..0c-mXgn8flnU-MYTzdaqQJIlnbdEJafWHozkT98Gk38"><img width="1088" alt="从各种评估法学硕士中进行选择" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/313145427-4c778006-5f93-4901-8ab8-620d908a7003.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..0c-mXgn8flnU-MYTzdaqQJIlnbdEJafWHozkT98Gk38" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我们允许您使用任何 OpenAI、Anthropic、Mistral、Azure 的 Openai 端点或 Anyscale 上托管的开源 LLM 来用作评估器。</font></font></p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879852-167488ec-9feb-48a7-9659-7bb9478584f9.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..P8g1ucHAUWDaHzwe21iFRqbZgGutb-0bWVGU49_5Ts0"><img width="1088" alt="定制评估" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879852-167488ec-9feb-48a7-9659-7bb9478584f9.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..P8g1ucHAUWDaHzwe21iFRqbZgGutb-0bWVGU49_5Ts0" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">UpTrain 提供了大量</font></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">定制评估的</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">方法。您可以自定义评估方法（思路与分类）、少量示例和场景描述。您还可以创建自定义评估器。</font></font></p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">即将推出：</font></font></h3><a id="user-content-coming-soon" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：即将推出：" href="#coming-soon"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">开始使用🙌</font></font></h1><a id="user-content-getting-started-" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：开始使用🙌" href="#getting-started-"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">方法 1：使用本地托管的仪表板</font></font></h2><a id="user-content-method-1-using-the-locally-hosted-dashboard" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：方法 1：使用本地托管的仪表板" href="#method-1-using-the-locally-hosted-dashboard"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">UpTrain 仪表板是一个基于 Web 的界面，可让您评估您的 LLM 申请。它是一个在本地计算机上运行的自托管仪表板。您无需编写任何代码即可使用仪表板。您可以使用仪表板评估您的 LLM 申请、查看结果并执行根本原因分析。</font></font></p>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">在开始之前，请确保您的计算机上安装了 docker。如果没有，您可以从</font></font><a href="https://docs.docker.com/get-docker/" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">这里</font></font></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">安装</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">。</font></font></p>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">以下命令将下载 UpTrain 仪表板并在本地计算机上启动它。</font></font></p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto"><pre><span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Clone the repository</span>
git clone https://github.com/uptrain-ai/uptrain
<span class="pl-c1">cd</span> uptrain

<span class="pl-c"><span class="pl-c">#</span> Run UpTrain</span>
bash run_uptrain.sh</pre><div class="zeroclipboard-container">
 
  </div></div>
<blockquote>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">注意：</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">   UpTrain Dashboard 目前处于</font></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Beta 版本</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">。我们希望得到您的反馈来改进它。</font></font></p>
</blockquote>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">方法2：使用UpTrain包</font></font></h2><a id="user-content-method-2-using-the-uptrain-package" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：方法 2：使用 UpTrain 包" href="#method-2-using-the-uptrain-package"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如果您是开发人员并希望将 UpTrain 评估集成到您的应用程序中，则可以使用 UpTrain 包。这允许以更加编程的方式来评估您的法学硕士申请。</font></font></p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">通过 pip 安装包：</font></font></h3><a id="user-content-install-the-package-through-pip" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：通过 pip 安装包：" href="#install-the-package-through-pip"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto"><pre>pip install uptrain</pre><div class="zeroclipboard-container">
    
  </div></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如何使用UpTrain：</font></font></h3><a id="user-content-how-to-use-uptrain" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：如何使用 UpTrain：" href="#how-to-use-uptrain"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">您可以通过提供 OpenAI API 密钥来运行评估，通过开源版本评估您的回答。</font></font></p>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-python notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto"><pre><span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s1">uptrain</span> <span class="pl-k">import</span> <span class="pl-v">EvalLLM</span>, <span class="pl-v">Evals</span>
<span class="pl-k">import</span> <span class="pl-s1">json</span>

<span class="pl-v">OPENAI_API_KEY</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-s">"sk-***************"</span>

<span class="pl-s1">data</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> [{
    <span class="pl-s">'question'</span>: <span class="pl-s">'Which is the most popular global sport?'</span>,
    <span class="pl-s">'context'</span>: <span class="pl-s">"The popularity of sports can be measured in various ways, including TV viewership, social media presence, number of participants, and economic impact. Football is undoubtedly the world's most popular sport with major events like the FIFA World Cup and sports personalities like Ronaldo and Messi, drawing a followership of more than 4 billion people. Cricket is particularly popular in countries like India, Pakistan, Australia, and England. The ICC Cricket World Cup and Indian Premier League (IPL) have substantial viewership. The NBA has made basketball popular worldwide, especially in countries like the USA, Canada, China, and the Philippines. Major tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, the US Open, French Open, and Australian Open have large global audiences. Players like Roger Federer, Serena Williams, and Rafael Nadal have boosted the sport's popularity. Field Hockey is very popular in countries like India, Netherlands, and Australia. It has a considerable following in many parts of the world."</span>,
    <span class="pl-s">'response'</span>: <span class="pl-s">'Football is the most popular sport with around 4 billion followers worldwide'</span>
}]

<span class="pl-s1">eval_llm</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-v">EvalLLM</span>(<span class="pl-s1">openai_api_key</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-v">OPENAI_API_KEY</span>)

<span class="pl-s1">results</span> <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-s1">eval_llm</span>.<span class="pl-en">evaluate</span>(
    <span class="pl-s1">data</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-s1">data</span>,
    <span class="pl-s1">checks</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span>[<span class="pl-v">Evals</span>.<span class="pl-v">CONTEXT_RELEVANCE</span>, <span class="pl-v">Evals</span>.<span class="pl-v">FACTUAL_ACCURACY</span>, <span class="pl-v">Evals</span>.<span class="pl-v">RESPONSE_COMPLETENESS</span>]
)

<span class="pl-en">print</span>(<span class="pl-s1">json</span>.<span class="pl-en">dumps</span>(<span class="pl-s1">results</span>, <span class="pl-s1">indent</span><span class="pl-c1">=</span><span class="pl-c1">3</span>))</pre><div class="zeroclipboard-container">
    <clipboard-copy aria-label="Copy" class="ClipboardButton btn btn-invisible js-clipboard-copy m-2 p-0 tooltipped-no-delay d-flex flex-justify-center flex-items-center" data-copy-feedback="Copied!" data-tooltip-direction="w" value="from uptrain import EvalLLM, Evals
import json

OPENAI_API_KEY = &quot;sk-***************&quot;

data = [{
    'question': 'Which is the most popular global sport?',
    'context': &quot;The popularity of sports can be measured in various ways, including TV viewership, social media presence, number of participants, and economic impact. Football is undoubtedly the world's most popular sport with major events like the FIFA World Cup and sports personalities like Ronaldo and Messi, drawing a followership of more than 4 billion people. Cricket is particularly popular in countries like India, Pakistan, Australia, and England. The ICC Cricket World Cup and Indian Premier League (IPL) have substantial viewership. The NBA has made basketball popular worldwide, especially in countries like the USA, Canada, China, and the Philippines. Major tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, the US Open, French Open, and Australian Open have large global audiences. Players like Roger Federer, Serena Williams, and Rafael Nadal have boosted the sport's popularity. Field Hockey is very popular in countries like India, Netherlands, and Australia. It has a considerable following in many parts of the world.&quot;,
    'response': 'Football is the most popular sport with around 4 billion followers worldwide'
}]

eval_llm = EvalLLM(openai_api_key=OPENAI_API_KEY)

results = eval_llm.evaluate(
    data=data,
    checks=[Evals.CONTEXT_RELEVANCE, Evals.FACTUAL_ACCURACY, Evals.RESPONSE_COMPLETENESS]
)

print(json.dumps(results, indent=3))" tabindex="0" role="button">
      <svg aria-hidden="true" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" data-view-component="true" class="octicon octicon-copy js-clipboard-copy-icon">

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我们提供预先构建的评估 📝</font></font></h1><a id="user-content-pre-built-evaluations-we-offer-" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：我们提供的预先构建的评估📝" href="#pre-built-evaluations-we-offer-"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879068-654b2289-2799-4310-84be-fcdd071f3e2e.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..vZ2VoTFcQReYXeQeIKqXBkpQ-udymIfd4Omu-4BdSx4"><img width="1088" alt="您的回复质量" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305879068-654b2289-2799-4310-84be-fcdd071f3e2e.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..vZ2VoTFcQReYXeQeIKqXBkpQ-udymIfd4Omu-4BdSx4" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">评估</font></font></th>
<th><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">描述</font></font></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/response-quality/response-completeness" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">响应完整性</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">对回答是否回答了指定问题的所有方面进行评分。</font></font></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/response-quality/response-conciseness" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">响应简洁</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">对生成的响应的简洁程度或是否包含与所提出的问题不相关的任何其他信息进行评分。</font></font></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/response-quality/response-relevance" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">响应相关性</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">对生成的上下文与指定问题的相关程度进行评分。</font></font></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/response-quality/response-validity" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">响应有效性</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如果生成的响应有效或无效，则评分。如果响应包含任何信息，则该响应被视为有效。</font></font></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/response-quality/response-consistency" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">响应一致性</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">对回答与所提出的问题以及所提供的上下文的一致性进行评分。</font></font></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305878811-a7e384a3-c857-4a71-a938-7a2a70f8db1e.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..wizBAZ1Nn_fQv2Kgu8WncTiPJHxhDALqIQtfPapuc9o"><img width="1088" alt="检索到的上下文的质量和响应的基础" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/305878811-a7e384a3-c857-4a71-a938-7a2a70f8db1e.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..wizBAZ1Nn_fQv2Kgu8WncTiPJHxhDALqIQtfPapuc9o" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">评估</font></font></th>
<th><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">描述</font></font></th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/context-awareness/context-relevance" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">上下文相关性</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">对上下文与指定问题的相关程度进行评分。</font></font></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/context-awareness/context-utilization" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">上下文利用</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">根据上下文中提供的信息，对指定问题生成的答案的完整性进行评分。</font></font></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/context-awareness/factual-accuracy" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">事实准确性</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">对生成的响应是否事实上正确并基于所提供的上下文进行评分。</font></font></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/context-awareness/context-conciseness" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">上下文简洁</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">评估从原始上下文引用的简洁上下文中是否存在不相关的信息。</font></font></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><a href="https://docs.uptrain.ai/predefined-evaluations/context-awareness/context-reranking" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">上下文重新排序</font></font></a></td>
<td><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">评估重新排序的上下文与原始上下文相比的效率。</font></font></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">监控法学硕士的即时漂移：UpTrain 基准</font></font></h1><a id="user-content-monitoring-prompt-drift-in-llms-benchmark-by-uptrain" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：监控法学硕士的即时漂移：UpTrain 的基准" href="#monitoring-prompt-drift-in-llms-benchmark-by-uptrain"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">大多数流行的法学硕士（如 GPT-4、GPT-3.5-turbo、Claude-2.1 等）都是闭源的，即通过 API 公开，对幕后发生的情况知之甚少。有许多报告表明存在快速漂移（或 GPT-4 变得懒惰）的情况，并且研究工作正在探索模型质量的下降。该基准测试试图通过评估模型对固定数据集的响应来跟踪模型行为的变化。</font></font></p>
<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/315241164-65b7e8c3-3f5e-48bb-98c1-88208520945b.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..kUn05EkXaG__R0hkO8IElD4Z7_KHmmwflBjJcXu7f-c"><img width="1316" alt="图像" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43818888/315241164-65b7e8c3-3f5e-48bb-98c1-88208520945b.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..kUn05EkXaG__R0hkO8IElD4Z7_KHmmwflBjJcXu7f-c" style="max-width: 100%;"></a>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"></font><a href="https://demo.uptrain.ai/benchmark" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">您可以在这里</font></font></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">找到基准</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">。</font></font></p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">资源💡</font></font></h1><a id="user-content-resources-" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：资源💡" href="#resources-"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ol dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://blog.uptrain.ai/how-to-evaluate-your-llm-applications" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如何评估您的 LLM 申请</font></font></a></li>
<li><a href="https://blog.uptrain.ai/llm-jailbreak/" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如何检测越狱</font></font></a></li>
<li><a href="https://blog.uptrain.ai/dealing-with-hallucinations-in-llms-a-deep-dive/" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">应对幻觉</font></font></a></li>
</ol>
<br>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">为什么我们要建造 UpTrain 🤔</font></font></h1><a id="user-content-why-we-are-building-uptrain-" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：为什么我们要构建 UpTrain 🤔" href="#why-we-are-building-uptrain-"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">过去 8 年我们一直在使用 ML 和 NLP 模型，但我们一直对模型中的许多隐藏故障感到沮丧，这促使我们构建了 UpTrain。 UpTrain 最初是作为一种 ML 可观察性工具开始的，它通过检查来识别准确性的回归。</font></font></p>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">然而我们很快就宣布LLM开发人员面临着一个更大的问题——没有好的方法来衡量他们的LLM申请的准确性，更不用说识别回归了。</font></font></p>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"></font><a href="https://github.com/openai/evals"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我们还看到了OpenAI evals</font></font></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">的发布</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">，他们建议使用 LLM 来对模型响应进行评分。此外，在阅读了</font></font><a href="https://arxiv.org/pdf/2212.08073.pdf" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Anthropic 如何利用 RLAIF</font></font></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">并直接深入 LLM 评估研究（我们很快将发布一个很棒的评估研究存储库）</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">后，我们更有信心解决这个问题。</font></font></p>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">所以，今天，UpTrain 是我们为 LLM 混乱带来秩序并回馈社区的尝试。虽然大多数开发人员仍然依靠直觉并通过审查几个案例来快速做出改变，但我们已经听到了足够多的回归故事，相信随着空间的成熟，“评估和改进”将成为 LLM 生态系统的关键部分。</font></font></p>
<ol dir="auto">
<li>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">稳健的评估使您能够系统地试验不同的配置，并通过帮助客观地选择最佳选择来防止任何回归。</font></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">它可以帮助您了解系统出了问题的地方，找到根本原因并修复它们 - 早在您的最终用户抱怨并可能流失之前。</font></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">及时注入和越狱检测等评估对于维护 LLM 申请的安全性至关重要。</font></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">评估可帮助您提供透明度并与最终用户建立信任 - 如果您向企业销售产品，这一点尤其重要。</font></font></p>
</li>
</ol>
<br>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">为什么要开源？</font></font></h1><a id="user-content-why-open-source" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：为什么要开源？" href="#why-open-source"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ol dir="auto">
<li>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我们知道，</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">在评估方面</font></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">没有一刀切的解决方案</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">。我们越来越多地看到开发者希望修改评估提示或一组选择或少数几个镜头示例等。我们相信最好的开发者体验在于开源，而不是暴露 20 个不同的参数。</font></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">促进创新</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">：法学硕士评估和使用法学硕士作为法官的领域仍处于起步阶段。我们几乎每天都看到许多令人兴奋的研究正在发生，开源为我们和我们的社区提供了合适的平台来实施这些技术并更快地创新。</font></font></p>
</li>
</ol>
<br>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">您可以如何提供帮助🙏</font></font></h2><a id="user-content-how-you-can-help-" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：您可以如何提供帮助🙏" href="#how-you-can-help-"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">我们不断努力增强 UpTrain，您可以通过多种方式做出贡献：</font></font></p>
<ol dir="auto">
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">注意任何问题或需要改进的地方：</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如果您发现任何错误或有改进的想法，请</font><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">在我们的 GitHub 存储库上</font></font><a href="https://github.com/uptrain-ai/uptrain/issues"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">创建问题。</font></font></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">直接贡献：</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如果您发现可以修复的问题或有代码改进建议，请随时直接向</font></font><a href="https://github.com/uptrain-ai/uptrain/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">存储库</font></font></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">贡献。</font></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">请求自定义评估：</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如果您的应用程序需要定制评估，请告诉我们，我们会将其添加到存储库中。</font></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">与您的工具集成：</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">需要与您现有的工具集成吗？伸出援手，我们会努力解决这个问题。</font></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">评估帮助：</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如果您需要评估帮助，请在我们的</font></font><a href="https://join.slack.com/t/uptraincommunity/shared_invite/zt-1yih3aojn-CEoR_gAh6PDSknhFmuaJeg" rel="nofollow"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Slack 频道</font></font></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">上发布您的疑问，我们会立即解决。</font></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">表达您的支持：</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">通过在 GitHub 上为我们加注 ⭐ 来表达您的支持，以跟踪我们的进度。</font></font></p>
</li>
<li>
<p dir="auto"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">传播信息：</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如果您喜欢我们所构建的内容，请在 Twitter 上给我们点赞！</font></font></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">非常感谢您的贡献和支持！感谢您参与 UpTrain 的旅程。</font></font></p>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">许可证💻</font></font></h1><a id="user-content-license-" class="anchor" aria-label="永久链接：许可证💻" href="#license-"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
